# abbey_identity (Resource)

Identity Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "abbey_identity" "my_identity" {
  linked = "...my_linked..."
  name   = "Johnnie Stamm"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `linked` (String) Json encoded string. See documentation for details
- `name` (String)

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
